phrs.translation: 血友病患者, 血友病的, 血友病丙
血友病传递者, 翻译

sentences.sentence: Because I was not hemophiliac, I was not at risk.
sentences.translation: 我并非非血友病患者，我以为我没有危险；

sentences.sentence: Objective To learn health education needs of Hemophiliac, and make corresponding health education plans.
sentences.translation: 目的了解血友病患者对健康教育的需求，并制定出相对应的健康教育方式。
